statement.tex: \text{The length $x$ of a rectangle is decreasing}\\ \text{at the rate of 5 cm/min and the width $y$ is}\\ \text{increasing at the rate of 4 cm/min. When }\\ \text{$x=$ 8 cm and $y=$ 6 cm, find the rates}\\ \text{of change of }\\ \text{(a) the perimeter, and (b) the area of the rectangle}

step.reason: \text{When }A=x\cdot y,\text{ then as per Chain Rule }\\ \frac{dA}{dt} = x\cdot\frac{dy}{dt} + y\cdot\frac{dx}{dt}.\\ \text{Also, the units of }\frac{dA}{dt}\text{ should be cm}^2/min
